questions.question: What is the title of the article that discusses the multiphase nature of Cu(pz) and Ag(pz) systems?
questions.answer: The Multiphase Nature of the Cu(pz) and Ag(pz) (Hpz = Pyrazole) Systems: Selective Syntheses and Ab-Initio X-ray Powder Diffraction Structural Characterization of Copper(I) and Silver(I) Pyrazolates

questions.question: Who are the authors of the article that provides selective syntheses and structural characterization of Copper(I) and Silver(I) Pyrazolates?
questions.answer: Norberto Masciocchi, Massimo Moret, Paolo Cairati, Angelo Sironi, G. Attilio Ardizzoia, Girolamo La Monica

questions.question: In which journal was the article about Copper(I) and Silver(I) Pyrazolates published?
questions.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society
